ValidationRule.description: Check all fields are filled for rollup to parent process
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(AND(Is_Rollup_To_P1_W1__c == true, OR( ISBLANK( Rollup_To_Parent__c ), ISBLANK( Base_Attribute_For_Weighted_Average_Calc__c ))),AND(Is_Rollup_To_P1_W1__c == false, OR( NOT(ISBLANK( Rollup_To_Parent__c )), NOT(ISBLANK( Base_Attribute_For_Weighted_Average_Calc__c )))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For rollup to P1/W1, "Is Rollup To P1/W1" checkbox, "Base Attribute For Weighted Average Calc" and "Rollup To Parent" fields are mandatory
